about_the_game:
Eh?! I arrived at Meowterra!

In this world of cats where joys and surprise converge, numerous trinkets that are deeply cherished by catizens can be found in every corner.

You will explore every secret place in Meowterra in search of lost items where keen observation and sharp eyes are much needed. Go learn about this super fun and beautiful world!

Unique Gameplay Brings Surprise

You have to face a number of challenges when the game starts. From unique scenes to hidden items, each discovery requires hard work. Only when you find all the items will you enter the next level. The difficulty rises gradually, providing full excitement! Of course, the Cat God will grant you great objects as help if you really can't find the last few items.

Multple Scenes for Explorations

In this game, you will traverse parks bustling with various feline activities, relax on cool summer beaches, and explore a variety of other scenic locations. Each scene is filled with unique little treasures waiting to be discovered; every setting is meticulously designed to let you experience the infinite charm of adventure.

Cute Cats Are Everywhere

You will meet many cute cat friends along the way. They may be getting a suntan, baking bread, hiking, hiding in bushes, resting on a tree, or simply running. We hope you will like them as much as we do.

With some reluctance, these cute fellas will also provide hints and objects to help you find their treasure more quickly. Encountering these special cats in this world is one of the greatest joys of this game.

Surely you want to play such a relaxing and cute hidden object game, right? Join us on the adventure into Meowterra!

name: Cat Trip

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Our cute cats have lost their treasures and need you to recover them. It's a magical world of cats and picturesque lands with unique sights. Help cats find lost items in Ice World, Sandtown, and many more places. Enjoy the delightful combination of discovery and destressing.
